00090 template <typename PropertyImpl>
00091 bool CPropertiesManager::RegisterPropertyType()
00092 {
00093        return s_propertyFactory.RegisterFactory(new istd::TSingleFactory<iser::IObject, PropertyImpl>(PropertyImpl::GetTypeName()), true);
00094 }
